data.eml:eml: Description of new genus and species of Ochlerini from Central America (Hemiptera: Pentatomidae: Discocephalinae) ¹

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Matesco, Viviana Cauduro, Grazia, Jocélia, Campos, Luiz Alexandre (2007): Description of new genus and species of Ochlerini from Central America (Hemiptera: Pentatomidae: Discocephalinae) ¹. Zootaxa 1562: 63-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.178367
